actions.command: execute if entity @e[tag=genjedded] run execute in
execute unless entity @e[tag=genjedded] run execute as @a[tag=itachi] at @s run summon armor_stand ^ ^1 ^ {Tags:['TsukoDet'],NoGravity:1b,Invisible:1b}
execute as @e[tag=TsukoDet] at @s rotated as @a[tag=itachi,limit=1] run tp @s ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
execute unless entity @e[tag=genjedded] run function itachi:check_which_mob
